name: Metamagic Channel
summary: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.
description:
Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy. Use 1 metamagic action that you can perform that normally takes 1 action and can be applied to the harm or heal spell. If you use it in this way, its effects apply only to a harm or heal spell.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.
